messages.subject: Unschooling is life was Re: Burning Man Posts
messages.msgSnippet: Freethinking_unschoolers@yahoogroups.com is well, freethinking. And the belief is as you state. Pat
messages.messageBody:
Freethinking_unschoolers@yahoogroups.com is well, freethinking. And
the belief is as you state.

Pat


--- In AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com, Sarah <sarahanne1@y...> wrote:
> I love this list and Unschooling Discussion, but is
> there an unmoderated,
> all-subjects-are-unschooling-since-unschooling-is-life
> list?
>
> Thanks!
>
> Sarah
>
> --- Pam Hartley <pamhartley@m...> wrote:
>
> > Hi all,
> >
> > If we could move on from the Burning Man posts that
> > would be
> > good. It's fine to mention things that might be of
> > interest to
> > unschoolers, but let's not get bogged down into
> > them. Private
> > emails, or starting a BurningMan list, all work.
> >
> > Thanks,
> >
> > Pam, moderator
> >
> >
>
>
> __________________________________________________
> Do You Yahoo!?
> Tired of spam? Yahoo! Mail has the best spam protection around
> http://mail.yahoo.com

Nichole
----- Original Message -----
From: Sarah
To: AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Tuesday, September 14, 2004 10:54 PM
Subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Burning Man Posts


I love this list and Unschooling Discussion, but is
there an unmoderated,
all-subjects-are-unschooling-since-unschooling-is-life
list?

Thanks!

Sarah

messages.subject: Burning Man Posts
messages.msgSnippet: Hi all, If we could move on from the Burning Man posts that would be good. It s fine to mention things that might be of interest to unschoolers, but let s not
messages.messageBody:
Hi all,

If we could move on from the Burning Man posts that would be
good. It's fine to mention things that might be of interest to
unschoolers, but let's not get bogged down into them. Private
emails, or starting a BurningMan list, all work.

Thanks,

Pam, moderator
